subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chris Davis hit the fourth grand slam of his career, and the host Baltimore Orioles got a dominant pitching performance from Miguel Gonzalez in a 9-1 victory over the skidding Minnesota Twins.
snippet: Chris Davis hit the fourth grand slam of his career, and the host Baltimore Orioles got a dominant pitching performance from Miguel Gonzalez in a 9-1 victory over the skidding Minnesota Twins.
